Name: tuberous sclerosis 1
Definition: A tuberous sclerosis that is characterized by hamartomas in multiple organ systems and has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the TSC1 gene on chromosome 9q34.

Name: tuberous sclerosis 2
Definition: A tuberous sclerosis that is characterized by hamartomas in multiple organ systems and has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance of heterozygous mutation in the TSC2 gene
